items.text: inside-edged but doesn't chop onto the stumps. Full and wide outside off, and the expansive cover drive comes off the bat's inside edge, and almost hits off stump
items.postText: Zak: "So that's all. I retire from all forms of cricket with immediate effect. As a die-hard fan i have passionately followed Pakistan Cricket. Lots of ups and downs but this is just unendurable for me. I have had my turn and to be honest I am tired. I have thought enough about it and its high time that i step aside and focus more on myself and my career. All the best Pakistan cricket and ICC after me. GoodBye"
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Mohammad Nawaz, 1 run

items.preText: Fans doing the naagin dance in the stands
items.text: holes out to deep midwicket A gentle length ball angling into his body, and he tries to pull this over the mid-wicket boundary. Hits it well, but not well enough. The substitute keeps his calm near the boundary
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Mohammad Nawaz, OUT

dismissal.text: Mohammad Nawaz c sub (Najmul Hossain Shanto) b Mustafizur Rahman 8 (19b 0x4 0x6) SR: 42.10

items.text: yorker on leg stump, and he does well to dig this away to the leg side
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Shaheen Shah Afridi, 1 run

items.text: full outside off stump, and angling further away. He swings and misses
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Junaid Khan, no run

items.text: just misses the off stump! Full on off stump, and he drives inside the line of the ball. The ball just goes past his outside edge and through to Liton
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Junaid Khan, no run

items.preText: Ziad: "The catcher's last name Shanto means calm in Bangla - calmness was in his name always"
items.text: full on middle stump, and the straight drive takes an outside edge to third man for a single
items.postText: HarishVaranasi: "@Zak, get out of Pakistan cricket at your peril, when Pakistan wins India don't come back, when Pakistan finishes off Australia, don't come back, treat this as an abberation, a step towards success - pains to see a cricket fan go even if I am from India. BTW 2007 WC is still fresh."
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Junaid Khan, 1 run

items.text: dropped by Liton! Fizz misses out on his fifth wicket. Full outside off, and the cover drive takes an outside edge to the keeper's left. Goes in and out of his gloves
items.postText: Jmani: "@Zak - Mutual buddy. I retired after India's test series against England recently. However, I smothered my way back in late into the Asia Cup. So see back again soon! Your's is a normal and justifiable emotion like mine. I know you. I feel you. I am there for you. And I also love you. Good luck"
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Shaheen Shah Afridi, 1 run

items.text: Afridi doing an Afridi! Full on off and he swings across the line, and connects so well with it... that it flies over the midwicket boundary for a maximum
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Shaheen Shah Afridi, SIX runs

items.text: low full toss on middle stump. Shaheen backs away to slog at this, but he toe-ends the shot back to Rubel
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Shaheen Shah Afridi, no run

items.text: another low full toss, but this is outside off stump. Slaps a shot to deep extra cover for a single
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Shaheen Shah Afridi, 1 run

items.preText: Jmani: "@Zak - Mutual buddy. I retired after India's test series against England recently. However, I smothered my way back in late into the Asia Cup. So see back again soon! Your's is a normal and justifiable emotion like mine. I know you. I feel you. I am there for you. And I also love you. Good luck"
items.text: full just outside off, and drilled down the ground to mid off for a quick single
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Junaid Khan, 1 run

items.text: full on middle stump, and he muscles a drive to wide long on for a single
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Shaheen Shah Afridi, 1 run

items.text: full just outside off stump, and he drives this down the ground past mid off. They could've come back for a second run, but looks like Pakistan are slowly giving up. Settling for <strike> a single</strike> no run
items.postText: Mustafizur's 4 for 42 is the best bowling performance for Bangladesh in Pak v Ban ODIs
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Junaid Khan, no run

items.text: short outside off stump. Shaheen considers pulling, but eventually lets it go
items.postText: CricFan: "Pakistan Fizzed out of Asia Cup"
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Shaheen Shah Afridi, no run

items.text: another short ball. Slower this time, and Shaheen swings wildly in a bid to pull. Can't connect at all
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Shaheen Shah Afridi, no run

items.text: back of a length, but it's the offcutter from Fizz. Lands on middle and angles into his body. He dabs a late cut to short third man for a single
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Shaheen Shah Afridi, 1 run

items.text: wiiild swing! Length ball on middle, and going away from Junaid. He comes down the ground and tries to swing across the line, but the bat's nowhere near the ball
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Junaid Khan, no run

items.text: length ball outside off, and
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Junaid Khan, no run

items.text: overpitched on middle stump. Mistimed to mid off after toe-ending the drive
items.postText: Chinmay: "Should we now expect PCB do a Matthew on Sarfarz ? He kinda deserves it though. His captaincy has been very for a lack of a better word amateur. " -- would be harsh. Gotta give him a few more series. Mathews'  axe has coincided with Sri Lanka's horrid ODI form over the past 12 months or so
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Junaid Khan, no run

items.text: full and wide outside off. Shaheen muscles a toe-ended drive to deep point for one
items.postText: Roma Ahmed : "@Zak Sports, let alone cricket, is like an octopus. Once entangled its almost impossible to free yourself. Whatever you decide you just never can abstain from it. Mark my words. We are all ready to welcome you back."
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Shaheen Shah Afridi, 1 run

items.text: back of a length on middle stump. Well directed, and it angles in to smack the batsman right near his wrist. Hope he's unhurt
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Junaid Khan, 1 run

items.preText: Zohaib Ahmed: "Its time to making Shoaib Malik the ODI captain, once and for all. " -- does he want it? Don't think so.
items.text: back of a length outside leg stump, and cramping Shaheen for space. Mistimes a pull to the off side
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Shaheen Shah Afridi, no run

items.text: back of a length outside leg stump, and he misses the pull shot. The ball goes over his bat and through to Liton
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Shaheen Shah Afridi, no run

items.preText: Sudhanshu: "People have been talking about 3 Indo-Pak matches even before the Tournament started. They have been talking about an Indo-Pak final for few days now. But it looks like BD had other plans. Cricket is truly a game of uncertainties."
items.text: full on leg stump, and he clears his front leg to swing across the line. Mistimes the shot to long off
items.postText: Osayed: "Shhhh.. The word sacking should not be used in Pakistan till the 2019 World Cup.. No matter how he is.. We need to stick with him.. Fine tune him. But he needs to continue. "
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Shaheen Shah Afridi, 1 run

items.text: full just outside off stump, and the cover drive is drilled straight to mid off. That's the over
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Junaid Khan, no run
